briefing.mission:
Last month's election results have been internationally disputed due to the widespread use of the Luban Army to guard the polling places, leading to severe voter intimidation.
The government has said those measures had to be taken due to the terror threat caused by supporters of the Luban Liberation Front.
With the vote blocked in UN Security Council, Mbakoran Army moved in a thunder run into the capital without firing a shot and oversaw the swearing-in of provisional LLF Government.
The Military, in disarray has mostly joined the new government, with small pockets of resistance.

The Khaybaran government, a supporter of the previous regime has vowed to restore peace in Luba. Ahead of the invasion Khaybaran special forces have infiltrated through the frontline to target enemy C2.
With one of the teams missing in the Dariyah region, Synixe was contracted to fulfill their mission of destroying the local cellular network ahead of attack. The invasion will begin at H-Hour with a missile barrage and subsequent mechanized assault into Ben Guerrir. After accomplishing their objectives Synixe is to support assault into Ben Guerrir.

H-Hour has been set for 07:20 local time.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Destroy Radio Masts
- Provide support to advancing force

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
- Find lost SOF team
- Destroy heavy assets in AO

<font color='#E3D310'>RESTRICTIONS</font>
- Do not enter Al Hariq and Ben Guerrir before H-Hour
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: United Khaybaran States

Khaybaran Government approved Resolution 67 and have begun preparation for an operation to restore the announced winner of the fall election.
Amidst the bombing campaign Khaybaran Special Forces have infiltrated behind enemy lines and destroyed enemy C3 support.
One of the teams has not reported back and lacking manpower they have decided to contract Synixe to finish their mission.

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Luban Liberation Front

Supporters of the losing party in the internationally disputed elections. The border area has seen the most resistance and left mostly militia with majority of the troops defecting across the border leaving mostly milita in charge. They wear green armbands.

Name: Mbakora
Location: Frontline

Supporters of LLF, after international condemnation of fall election, they drove tanks straight into capital of Haut-Lomami and have put provisional government of LLF in charge.
Now with the threat of invasion looming they have deployed along the frontline as the primary army in charge.

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Name: United Khaybaran States
Location: Frontline

Her Majesty's Armed Forces are standing by for H-Hour and in this sector their main target is Ben Guerrir.

Name: Luban Union
Location: Pockets of resistance and frontline

Remainder of Luban Army loyal to the previous government. They will be joining Khaybaran forces in the main attack.


<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Location: Towns

Civilian population has been ordered to not leave towns

INSERT YOUR MISSION DESCRIPTION HERE

YOU CAN ADD AS MUCH AS YOU FEEL IS RELEVANT

missions.name: The Last Gift of Christmas
missions.summary: With Santa tracking done for the year, disaster strikes

briefing.mission:
Santa Claus was done with his delivery of presents, and returned back to the North Pole.

NORAD had tracked his sleigh, but now that the deliveries were complete, operations had shut down for the year. His security detail had gone home to spend the days following Christmas with their families, their hard work and sacrifices appreciated but no longer needed.

The world had started to forget about Santa again, until next November when the stores would switch their playlists once again.

This was exactly what the Grinch had been waiting for. With Santa's security detail gone, with eyes turned away, it was the perfect time to strike.

Santa has been kidnapped. Secret demands have been made, and if they are not met, Santa's fate is uncertain.

Santa's elite security team, the Special Northern Operations Wing (SNOW), have been dispatched to rescue him. Negiotiates with the likes of the Grinch will not be entertained.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Secure Santa Claus and extract him

<font color='#595305'>SECONDARY</font>
- Locate and neutralize Grinch operatives in the area

<font color='#E3D310'>RESTRICTIONS</font>
- No negotiations with the Grinch will be entertained
- Keep fighting and Santa out of view of civilians
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Special Logistics & Emergency Incident Ground Headquarters


<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Grinch Operatives

Hellbent on ruining Christmas, these operatives are well-equipped and trained for specialist tactics. They are believed to be armed with a variety of weapons and explosives, and are operating under the command of the Grinch himself.

missions.name: Synixe Training Facility
missions.summary: Premiere Training Facility for the Synixe Corporation

missions.name: Nur al-Sahra
missions.summary: Contractors work with Takistani forces to fight an insurgency and restore stability

briefing.mission:
The Wahat Nura Province of Takistan has been a hotbed of insurgent activity in recent months.

Virelia and the IEA are concerned about destabilization in the region, which could spill over into neighboring countries.

We have been hired by the IEA to assist in stabilizing the area, by advising the local Takistani forces, and conducting high value raids to dismantle insurgent operations.

Resupplies will be few and far between, so conserve your resources and plan accordingly.
briefing.objectives:
<font color='#E3D310'>PRIMARY</font>
- Objectives will be provided on-site by the Takistani commander.
briefing.situation:
<font color='#e3d310'>EMPLOYER</font>
Name: Integrated Economies Alliance (IEA)
Location: HQ in Virelia

Concerned about regional stability in Takistan, the IEA has contracted your unit to assist local forces in countering insurgent threats in the Wahat Nura Province.

<font color='#d81717'>ENEMY FORCES</font>
Name: Ikhwan as-Sayf
Location: Wahat Nura Province, Takistan

A well-armed insurgent group operating in the Wahat Nura Valley, known for guerrilla tactics and ambushes. They are equipped with small arms, RPGs, and light vehicles. Their motive is to destabilize the region and undermine local governance.

<font color='#1d69f6'>FRIENDLY FORCES</font>
Name: Takistani Military
Location: Various bases in Wahat Nura Province

The Takistani Military has a small presence in the region, made up of local soldiers with limited training and equipment. They are cooperative but require guidance and support to effectively counter the insurgent threat.

<font color='#139120'>INDEPENDENT FORCES</font>
Name: Takistani Militia
Location: Various locations in Wahat Nura Province

The militia consists of local villagers and military deserters who have taken up arms to defend their villages. Their allegiances can be fluid, and they may either assist or hinder operations depending on the situation.

<font color='#993399'>CIVILIAN CONSIDERATIONS</font>
Many civilians in the Wahat Nura Valley are caught in the crossfire between insurgents and military forces. They may have family members involved with one or more of the factions. They may report on activities to any side.
